T02D2426:40a-1: sh'u n+ya t'a drishti n'a ma /
T02D2426:40a-3: stong pa nyid kyi lta ba zhes bya ba /
T02D2426:40a-4: spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2426:40a-5: sems kyi rtog rtse chos nyid ni //
T02D2426:40a-6: sa bon nam mkha'i dbyings su smos //
T02D2426:40a-7: bdag med gzhon nus mgul nas 'khyud //
T02D2426:40a-8: gnyid sad byed pa nyid du gnas //
T02D2426:40a-9: spongs shig dor shig bdag rmongs so //
T02D2426:40a-10: kye ho bcings pa ma lus pa //
T02D2426:40a-11: sha ba ri bde chen por rol //
T02D2426:40a-12: stong pa'i btsun mo 'khyud byas te //
T02D2426:40a-13: kye ho lus ngag sems smin te //
T02D2426:40a-14: thams cad dus su brtags pa yis //
T02D2426:40a-15: sha ba ri ni myos par 'gyur //
T02D2426:40a-16: dga' ba'i rnam pa thams cad du //
T02D2426:40a-17: sha ba ri ni gnyid log nas //
T02D2426:40a-18: gnyid ni nam mkha'i dbyings su log / kye ho bdag gi de nyid ni //
T02D2426:40a-19: sa bon nam mkhar mnyam par smos //
T02D2426:40a-20: 'bras bu nam mkhar skar chen shar //
T02D2426:40a-21: spongs shig dor shig bdag rmongs so //
T02D2426:40a-22: srid pas bcings pa'i glang chen bsad //
T02D2426:40a-23: dbang po lnga yi gtor ma byas //
T02D2426:40a-24: bdag gi sdug bsngal thams cad spangs //
T02D2426:40a-25: spongs shig dor shig bdag rmongs so //
T02D2426:40a-26: nyin mtshan rtag tu gnyid med par //
T02D2426:40a-27: rang gi sems la bya ra byas //
T02D2426:40a-28: de nas skyes pa bud med ni //
T02D2426:40a-29: gcig tu dben par song ste gnas //
T02D2426:40a-30: gtso bo 'jig rten mgon pa smra //
T02D2426:40b-0: spongs @40b shig dor shig bdag rmongs so //
T02D2426:40b-1: stong pa'i btsun mo 'khyud byas te //
T02D2426:40b-2: sha ba ri bde chen por gnas //
